ValidationRule.description: give error when changing record type and have in
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.CEPSkipValidationRules__c.Case__c), ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Case', OR( ( ISPICKVAL(CategoryT1__c, 'Fuel quality') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT1__c, 'Invoice') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT1__c, 'Behavior') ), ( ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Card acceptance issues') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Delivery Card/PIN issues') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Fuel quality') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Invoice problems') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Voucher business') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Transactions') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Fines') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'OBUs issues') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Issues') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT2__c, 'Service Quality') ), ( ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Card acceptance issues') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Card / PIN not received') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Wrong card embossed') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Illegible PIN') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other card claim') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Fuel quality') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Transaction issue') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Wrong or missing data') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other invoice claim') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Voucher usage') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Voucher delivery') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Voucher other') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Doubled transactions') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Not recognized TRX') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Transactions received after cancellation') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Vignette') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Fines') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Blocked device') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Blocked account') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Device not working') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other OBUs claim') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other card complaint') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Invoice not received') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other invoice complaint') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Other OBUs complaint') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Not working') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'CSO Agent') || ISPICKVAL(CategoryT3__c, 'Sales or Other') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The category values you selected are not valid for the type of case you are trying to convert
